definition: to fix/to fasten/to set rigidly in place/fixed/set/regular
to freeze/to solidify/to congeal/fig. with rapt attention

sentences.english: The tanks shall be firmly fixed onto the ground.
sentences.chinese: 該貯槽必須牢固建築於地上。

sentences.english: When fracture of the wounded lower limbs is secured, limbs wants curved move to show bend ancon unbend to bind.
sentences.chinese: 傷員下肢骨折固定時，肢體要彎着呈屈肘狀伸直捆綁。

sentences.english: New solids control system is being designed by them.
sentences.chinese: 他們正在設計新的固控系統。

sentences.english: In this monographic paper, the concept and the measuring methods of static gel strength, Sgs, for well cementing slurries are presented.
sentences.chinese: 論述了固井水泥漿靜膠凝強度的概念和測試方法。

sentences.english: The proper solid content of the adhesive should be 40% approximately.
sentences.chinese: 標籤膠的合適固含量應在40%左右。

sentences.english: They can also replace some spring spacers, pin lockers and other mechanical fasteners.
sentences.chinese: 可替代彈簧墊，開口銷等機械鎖固方式。

sentences.english: Amorphous material is one of the most active part of the solid phase of soil.
sentences.chinese: 無定形物質是土的固相中很活躍的一個組成部分。

sentences.english: So dS for u and V fixed is greater than zero.
sentences.chinese: 所以當內能u和體積V固定時，dS大於零。

sentences.english: And the fouling of CaSO4 have been studied in the Vapor-Liquid-Solid Three-Phase Flow.
sentences.chinese: 研究了汽液固三相流條件下硫酸鈣的結垢過程。

sentences.english: Who can be steadfast without change?
sentences.chinese: 固時俗之流從兮，又孰能無變化？

sentences.english: Because there is no long-term solid settlements life, that they have learned various skill.
sentences.chinese: 由於無長期固定居點的生活，使他們學會了各種技藝。

sentences.english: Plate balance is critical at the time of distal screw fixation.
sentences.chinese: 在進行遠端螺釘固定時，鋼板的平衡非常關鍵。

sentences.english: Sometimes you have to think outside the box -- and the office.
sentences.chinese: 有時候你要跳出固思維模式，也眼光辦公室之外。

sentences.english: The higher the temperature of casting and rolling, the lower the solid ratio in microstructure.
sentences.chinese: 鑄軋溫度從高到低，固相率明顯從小到大。

sentences.english: In solid film, these coumarin-conjugated porphyrins still maintain high energy transfer efficiency.
sentences.chinese: 我們發現在固相中這些卟啉也有很高的能量轉移效率。

sentences.english: Polyurethane emulsion(PU) with solid content of 35% was synthesized by using acetone method.
sentences.chinese: 用丙酮法合成了固含量爲35%的聚氨酯成膜乳液。

definition: classical final particle, similar to modern 了[le5]
to deteriorate/to decline/to slump/also written 陵夷
to shake/to flap/to vibrate/to resonate/to rise up with spirit/to rouse oneself
